func:
import os
import sys
from subprocess import Popen

#track = "/media/pi/MP3/MAIN/Toystore.mp3"
track_en = "/media/pi/MP3/MAIN/EN/Ambience 1 EN.mp3"
track_loc = "/media/pi/MP3/MAIN/FR/Ambience 1 FR.mp3"

#if msg['play'] == True:
if msg['payload'] == '302' or msg['payload'] == '309':
    player2 = Popen(['sudo', 'killall', 'omxplayer.bin'])
if msg['payload'] == '306':
    if msg['lang_code'] == 1:
        player2 = Popen(['omxplayer', track_en])
    if msg['lang_code'] == 2:
        player2 = Popen(['omxplayer', track_loc])

msg.payload = "lamp_first_room_0";
return msg;

name: lamp_table_first_room_off
func:
msg.payload = "lamp_table_first_room_0";
return msg;

name: light_room_2_off
func:
msg.payload = "lamp_second_room_0"
return msg;

name: lamp_table_first_room_on
func:
msg.payload = "lamp_table_first_room_200";
return msg;
